description: Miscellaneous cultural references and items popular in trans communities

terms.definition: Another name for /tttt/, quad-t. For further clarification, /tttt/ has become a nickname for the /lgbt/ imageboard on 4chan as it is primarily filled with trans people.
A shark plushie from Ikea that has become a meme among trans women and the general LGBT community.
Fallout New Vegas, a game popular among trans women.
Hearts of Iron 4, a game popular among trans women.
a beloved character from the visual novel game "NEET Girl Date Night", created by hitsuji. She is not canonically trans but is clearly at least heavily inspired by online trans culture.
An 4tran subreddit user that sorts posts by new to better engage with the community in realtime.
An avatar creation website. Artists submit different avatar creation systems, including 4tran themed avatars.
